OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive transrectal ultrasound guide radioactive I-125 seed implanted prostate . At least one week prior implant , patient undergo transurethral ultrasound study determine volume prostate . Following implantation , seed extrude bladder lodge urethral wall retrieve , extra seed may implant identify `` cold spot '' uniform seed distribution . Prostate rebiopsy require start hormonal therapy local progression biochemical failure without clear focus progression . Quality life assess every 3 month 1 year , every 6 month 1 year , annually 3 year . Patients follow every 3 month 1 year , every 6 month 2 year , annually thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 95 patient accrue study within 1 year .
